channel.title: Nolita on Table41NYC
channel.description: Recent content in Nolita on Table41NYC

item.title: The Sosta
item.description: This place was ok. Pasta was good, but it needs protein. The meat cheese board was just ok.

item.title: Cherche Midi
item.description: Same owner as the Minetta Tavern. Great for the price. I liked teh suckling pork becuase it was straight up fat with crispy skin. Got the whole fish, and it was great too. Only problem is it is CLOSED.

item.title: Egg Shop
item.description: This place sucks, is pricey, and is extremely overrated. I don’t understand why this place has so many people. $18 for a egg on top of salad with fried chicken.
